Package org.webcurator.ui.site.validator

Class Summary
SiteAgencySearchValidator Validate adding an authorising agency to a Harvest authorisation.
SiteAgencyValidator Validate the saving of a harvest ahuthorisation.
SitePermissionValidator Validate saving a harvest permission.
SiteURLsValidator Validate adding a url to a harvest autorisation.
SiteValidator Validate saving a harvest autorisation or adding a annotation to one.
TransferSeedsValidator Validate transfering seeds from one permission to another.
